commits.message: Fix: Add critical error handling to save operations
Fix autosave interval resetting on every component mount
Delete global save lock - simplify autosave coordination
feat: Add random loop continuation for experimental exploration boost
feat: Implement agentic ReAct loop with proactive tool use (industry best practice)
feat: Implement LLM error pattern tracking and learning system
Fix autosave timer cleanup when disabled
enhance: Improve structured error formatting in LLM response coordinator
feat: Add structured error responses for LLM self-correction
Fix save-and-quit flow and auto-cleanup corrupted saves
fix: Preserve leading spaces in response formatting to prevent text concatenation issues
Add overwrite button and Save & Quit option to exit flow
Fix: Cmd-Q now shows confirmation before quitting
Add debug mode for autosave interval testing
Add confirm dialogs before exit to menu/desktop
Delete bloated bundle autosave logic - simplify to working file-per-autosave
Fix critical autosave dynamic import error in Electron builds
fix: Support both repo and query parameters in GitHub capability
Add automated beta deployment script and comprehensive documentation
Bump version to 0.8.9 - Beta release with error logging
Error Logging & Debug Tools (#241)
Fix lint and typecheck errors
Add broadcast mode for touch-optimized election visualization
feat: polish Kalshi integration for production
feat: Implement spatial clustering for arc destinations with adaptive radius
fix: use ACTUAL event_ticker from API, not broken derivation
docs: Add comprehensive documentation and performance optimizations to arc visualizations
feat: Add shift-drag box selection for demand bubbles with arc visualizations
feat: comprehensive Kalshi API refactor with smart caching & types
security: Run all Docker containers as non-root users (#70)
refactor: fetch event titles upfront in parallel batch
fix: fetch event titles for resolved/closed Kalshi markets
feat: refactor Kalshi positions to data-centric table display
refactor: use Kalshi API properly for market titles, delete regex horror
feat: add Kalshi markets to sidebar TOC and improve market titles
fix: mobile UX improvements for predictions page
fix: Use existing node user instead of creating artie user
feat: add real-time portfolio P&L tracking
docs: add mutagen auto-sync setup for .env
security: Run brain container as non-root user
refactor: remove example commentary files (no fake data)
feat: add Kalshi integration and calibration analysis to predictions
feat: Newspaper template system with realistic filtering and debug tools
feat: Finalize and integrate observational learning system
feat: Add observational learning system for passive Discord message collection
fix: Remove Subway Builder from default guild whitelist
Remove test files - keep repo clean
Fix autosave validation checking wrong data structure level
Add autosave validation fix with defensive logging and tests
Fix autosave validation checking wrong data structure level
refactor: Professional-grade capability descriptions with comprehensive examples
feat: Improve capability descriptions with explicit financial/real-time examples
feat: Add stylized capability execution indicator
fix: Add real Wolfram Alpha API key to deployment
fix: Use correct method for message chain generation
fix: TypeScript error in llm-response-coordinator
fix: Capabilities execution and conscience feedback
fix: resolve critical bugs and clean up TypeScript errors
feat: Smart model configuration with auto-reflection enabled
